cont_diff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«exprℕ∞» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →A[ ] » -/
/-

/-- A continuous affine map between normed vector spaces is smooth. -/
theorem cont_diff {n : «exprℕ∞»} (f : «expr →A[ ] » V 𝕜 W) : cont_diff 𝕜 n f :=
  by
  rw [f.decomp]
  apply f.cont_linear.cont_diff.add
  simp only
  exact cont_diff_const
#align cont_diff cont_diff
